description:
A flashback reveals the story of how Garp changed Chinjao`s world forever. Back in the present, Luffy and his opponent trade ferocious blows that literally rock the colosseum!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le combat se termine. Lucy contre Chinjao !
The Fierce Battle Coming to the End! Lucy vs. Chinjao!
Заключение яростного сражения! Луффи VS Цинцзяо!
激戦決着! ルーシーVSチンジャオ!
